table_description: Game level dataset, providing information and attribution on each of the games played (including information on the teams, venue, attendance, and data availability). Use this to pull information such as game type (e.g. playoffs, regular season) and attributes about the game.

values.column_description: Unique identifier for each game
Unique identifier string for each game within the system
The date and time when the game was scheduled
The number of attendees at the game
Indicates if the game time is valid
Indicates if the game is played at a neutral site
Indicates if the game is a conference competition
Indicates if play-by-play data is available for the game
Indicates if the game is recent
The start date of the game

Name of the broadcaster
